name: Divinity in the Void
description:
Divinity in the Void is a space fantasy supplement for the BOLT RPG Engine.

It offers a new approach to character creation, a full weapon list, a space magic system, and integration with the spaceship combat system in Saturn’s Gate by the Acetronomer: https://acetronomer.itch.io/saturns-gate

This supplement can be used in its original setting of the Jharavi Spiral, or adapted to other space fantasy settings one might be interested in!

Currently, this draft is incomplete. Expect proofreading, more detailed ship rules, and Voidmetal sword forms to come soon, all as free updates!
